title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama—chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; install via pip and integrate into any Python app.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model chats, file uploads, and user management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that brings Ollama-powered code completion and inline suggestions similar to GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of small utilities to convert GGML files, benchmark latency, and batch-process prompts with Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing models via Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK for Ollama with Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starters, and reactive streams.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes, Raspberry Pi, AWS Lambda, and integrating with Home-Assistant.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI built with Tauri (Rust+React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that connects to Ollama and supports conversation persistence via SQLite.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama binaries and module for declarative deployment on NixOS machines.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger SDK example pipeline that spins up Ollama in a container and runs automated model benchmarks.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that exposes Ollama endpoints with rate-limiting and OpenAI-compatible routes.
